title: Ticket #5630: Remove unused AllowLogError code from DAGMan
description: AllowLogError still gets passed around to a bunch of places in DAGMan, even though we no longer actually do anything with it...
remarks:
2016-Apr-18 17:22:20 by wenger:
Hmm -- job_dagman_subdag-A failed on quite a few (but not all) platforms on branch build/test. Need to take a look at that...

2016-Apr-25 11:03:28 by wenger:
Okay, the latest version of this got everything green except for a few of the usual random Windows test errors.
